title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 212.20 - Special preferences
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 212.20 - Special preferences

State Regulations
(a) Any party claiming a preference under
CPLR 3403 may apply to the court by making a motion in a motion part, in
accordance with CPLR 3403(b), the note of issue therein referred to being
deemed a reference to a notice of trial. (b) Counterclaims and cross-claims. A
counterclaim or cross-claim which is not entitled to a preference shall not
itself defeat the plaintiff's right to a preference under this
section. (c) Result of
preference being granted. If a preference is granted, the action shall be
placed on a ready calendar for a day certain ahead of all nonpreferred pending
cases, as directed by the court, unless the court otherwise orders. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
212.20

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
